sense.name: alter and make impure
sense.examples: Jenny doctored the rose water with geranoil. Paul and Fran doctored the punch with rum. Shawn doctored the mashed potatoes so he wouldn't have to eat them. Frakie doctored the swimmimg pool to turn people green.

sense.name: give medical treatment
sense.examples: He doctors people. EMTs doctor victims until they get to the hospital. Shawna doctors her sister even though she doesn't have a license. In 3rd world countries, anyone who doctors, does.

sense.name: repair, mend
sense.examples: Jen doctored her broken pencil back in to one piece. Dad will doctor your doll so it's good as new. Zach doctored the chair back together with epoxy. Susie said she'd doctor the tv set.
